definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: Oily skin after bathing, every mind and the body fluent in its landscaping.
sentences.chinese: 洗浴後皮膚油膩，渾身舒暢，氣血通順，心曠神怡。

sentences.english: The same principle may make for smoother writing.
sentences.chinese: 這同一原則也可使文章寫得更通順。

sentences.english: Go over that contract with a fine-tooth comb before you agree to anything.
sentences.chinese: 檢查一下，在簽訂之前確定合同上各項條款通順有理。

sentences.english: His interpretation is coherent and intelligible.
Comb clear and coherent, natural air, after air can restorable .
sentences.chinese: 梳理通順，自然晾乾，晾乾後即可恢復原狀。

sentences.english: Felt that this biggest advantage, is lets me drain smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 感覺這最大的好處，是讓我排泄通順。

sentences.english: Talents are the primary source of TOSO.
sentences.chinese: 人才，是通順的第一資源。

definition: to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used)/punctuation/periods and commas/sentences and phrases
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
lit. to scratch the outside of the boot (idiom)/fig. beside the point/ineffectual
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
